entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 10:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with a few flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except locally 30 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
